title: Why we need your support
intro: Mindra is built to gently support people, help with goals and habits. Any contribution speeds up development, localization and new features.

goal.title: Funding goal — Mindra App
goal.text: We’re building the Mindra mobile app. Headline features at launch: FaceTime-style calls with Mindra (pick the avatar/face), all Telegram-bot features in one place, and 11 languages.

features.1: Face-to-face calls with Mindra — pick the look and talk “face to face”.
features.2: All Telegram-bot features in one place: dialogue, goals, habits, reports.
features.3: 11 languages, a friendly UI, and a future foundation for offline mode.

progress.title: Progress
progress.subtitle: For example: raised $12,000 of $150,000 • 127 people already supported.

free.name: Free
free.desc: Same as the bot, without Mindra FaceTime.

founders.title: Founder discounts
founders.tier300: From $300 — lifetime 35% off (by email or Telegram ID).
founders.tier500: From $500 — lifetime 40% off (by email or Telegram ID).
founders.note: We’ll apply the discounts to any paid plans once the app launches.
